name: Rare Ghazt
description: Trying to get a Ghazt is akin to catching smoke with your hands. So you can imagine that trying to get your hands on a Rare Ghazt is like trying to catch a particular puff of smoke that floats by once in a blue moon, with your hands... while blindfolded. This centaurine 'Rarethereal' is the crowning jewel of any Monster collection.
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 1 day 21 hr 30 min, Enhanced Time: 1 day 10 hr 7 min 30 sec
etherealBreedingTime: Breeding Time: 12 hr 38 min 20 sec, Enhanced Time: 9 hr 28 min 45 sec
